ygData.subject: RE: Guild thingy
ygData.msgSnippet: I think for all kakis to enjoy this game, lvl different shldn t be too big.  So, take a look ard u, who the following characterics: - Highest lvl goon (time
ygData.messageBody:
I think for all kakis to enjoy this game, lvl different shldn't be too big. So, take a look ard u, who the following characterics:

- Highest lvl goon (time for him to slow down a bit to let other gain lvl)
- Can play during work (can perform his GM duties even when working)
- Can play long hr (can organise activities and perform guild duties)
- No life (self-explanatory)

Anyone with the a/m elements (other than the last points, where most kakis posses) will get my nomination ;)

On Tuesday, 17 August, 1999 5:09 PM, Sereph [SMTP:garford@...] wrote:
> From: Sereph <garford@...>
>
> After all the messages about cmaping, SM nuking etc...... You are still
> have not vote for a goon to lead the guild leh......
>
> If no ones starts to saboh, one of the officers will be forced to be
> promoted to guildmaster.
